scripts.posttest: sh -c 'if [ -z "$CI" ] && [ -f ortoni-report/ortoni-report.html ]; then (open ortoni-report/ortoni-report.html || xdg-open ortoni-report/ortoni-report.html || start ortoni-report/ortoni-report.html); fi'
scripts.open:ortoni: open ortoni-report/ortoni-report.html || xdg-open ortoni-report/ortoni-report.html || start ortoni-report/ortoni-report.html
scripts.k6:dev: mkdir -p k6-results && NODE_ENV=dev k6 run tests/perfromance/auth.k6.js
scripts.k6:stage: mkdir -p k6-results && NODE_ENV=stage k6 run tests/perfromance/auth.k6.js
scripts.k6:prod: mkdir -p k6-results && NODE_ENV=prod k6 run tests/perfromance/auth.k6.js
scripts.k6:report: open k6-results/summary.html || xdg-open k6-results/summary.html || start k6-results/summary.html
scripts.test:all: playwright test && mkdir -p k6-results && k6 run tests/perfromance/auth.k6.js
